issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product
resolution.name: Not Our Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
Hi,

I tried publishing one of my classic project on App Store but every time tried it showed me a success message but when I open organizer window in xcode, I'm unable to find the Archive file. I tried the same thing with a new 'Hello World' project in classic but it appears to be a problem with classic project. 

Can you please help me out with issue. I'm working with the following configuration :
Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.8.0.201609101003
SDK : 5.5.0 GA
Platform : IOS
fields.summary: Unable to publish Classic project to App Store

comments.body:
Never mind got the solution,
But for anyone who is looking for the solution with similar problem, just try changing the xCode version. For me I got my xCode updated to 8.1 and it worked like a charm..! 
You can get a brief about the compatibility between Titanium SDK and xCode from below link :
[http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Titanium_Compatibility_Matrix-section-src-29004837_TitaniumCompatibilityMatrix-Xcode]

Thanks 
Enjoy you day...!
